title: Ubisoft Is Bringing NFTs To Ghost Recon: Breakpoint - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.07.21
description:
Tam and Gary talk about Ubisoft's big move into NFTs with Ghost Recon: Breakpoint, Garfield coming to Nickelodeon All-Stars Brawl, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:50 - Housekeeping

A new episode of Gamescast went up this morning and it is our Halo Infinite Campaign Review featuring Tim, Mike, Andy, and Parris. You can catch all their thoughts on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.

BUT THAT’S NOT ALL FOR HALO: Xcast is also up right now and that’s the crew talking more about Halo Infinite multiplayer and the fixes that the game needs.

On the PlayStation side of things: PS I Love You XOXO is going up a day later. We’re recording tomorrow and that episode will be up for everyone on Wednesday so write in with your questions and thoughts. Topic of the show will likely be about the rumored Project Spartacus.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy, Black Jack, &Greg Miller Returns to Content Next Month, Nick Should Quit Now!

The Roper Report -
00:08:21 - Ubisoft Is Adding NFTs to Its Games
00:28:40 - HBO’s Last of Us Tv Show Adds Nick Offerman As Bill – GameSpot, Eddie Makuch 
00:35:49 - Ad  
00:38:56 - Halo Infinite Campaign Missions Are Not Replayable – GameSpot, Eddie Makuch
00:47:00 - Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl's First DLC Character Is Garfield – IGN, Kat Bailey
00:50:25 - Call Of Duty: Warzone Devs Stage Walkout Over Layoffs 
00:54:45 - Out today
Reader mail:
00:57:30 - Do you think the Legacy Collection is a worth PS5 upgrade? - KBABZ
01:00:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Andy
